file_insights.changes_summary: Added keyboard accessibility features to ProjectCard component
key_modifications: Added conditional role='button' attribute when onClick handler exists
Added conditional tabIndex={0} to make component keyboard focusable
Added onKeyDown handler that triggers onClick on Enter/Space key press
Made hoverable prop conditional based on onClick presence
file_insights.impact: Improves accessibility for keyboard-only users and screen reader users

patterns_discovered.description: Using ternary operators to conditionally apply accessibility attributes (role, tabIndex, onKeyDown) only when the component has interactive behavior
patterns_discovered.benefit: Prevents unnecessary accessibility noise and ensures semantic HTML only when needed

patterns_discovered.description: Wrapping onClick handler with keyboard event detection (Enter/Space keys) for keyboard accessibility
patterns_discovered.implementation: onKeyDown handler that calls onClick with proper key detection

patterns_discovered.description: Following WCAG guidelines for interactive elements: role attribute, keyboard navigation (tabIndex), and keyboard event handling
patterns_discovered.references: WCAG 2.1 Level AA compliance for keyboard accessibility

gotchas_discovered.description: Must only apply accessibility attributes (role, tabIndex) when onClick handler exists, otherwise creates false affordances
gotchas_discovered.mitigation: Use ternary operators to check onClick presence before applying attributes

gotchas_discovered.description: The diff shows onKeyDown handler calling handleKeyDown() but this function is not visible in the diff - must exist in component or be added
gotchas_discovered.severity: HIGH - Code will break if handleKeyDown is not defined
gotchas_discovered.recommendation: Verify handleKeyDown implementation exists or add it if missing

gotchas_discovered.gotcha: tabIndex={0} only appropriate for single interactive element
gotchas_discovered.description: Setting tabIndex={0} adds element to tab order - verify Card isn't nested within other interactive elements
gotchas_discovered.mitigation: Ensure proper tab order management and no nested interactive elements

approach_outcome.task_completion: Keyboard accessibility successfully added to ProjectCard component
quality_indicators: Made tabIndex conditional to avoid accessibility debt

recommendations.reason: The diff references handleKeyDown(e, onClick) but implementation is not shown - this could be a broken reference
recommendations.action: Check that handleKeyDown is properly defined in the component or add implementation for key detection (Enter/Space)

recommendations.reason: Keyboard accessibility should be verified with automated tests
recommendations.action: Add tests for: tabIndex visibility, onKeyDown firing on Enter/Space, role attribute presence

recommendations.reason: Future maintainers should understand the conditional accessibility pattern
recommendations.action: Add JSDoc comments explaining why accessibility attributes are conditional

recommendations.recommendation: Test with keyboard and screen readers
recommendations.reason: Automated checks are insufficient for accessibility
recommendations.action: Manual testing with Tab navigation and screen reader (NVDA/JAWS/VoiceOver)

recommendations.reason: Interactive cards may benefit from Escape key support for consistency
recommendations.action: Evaluate if Escape key handling is needed based on component context
